an4.104:1.3: Uttāno gambhīrobhāso, gambhīro uttānobhāso, uttāno uttānobhāso, gambhīro gambhīrobhāso—
an4.104:1.5: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro udakarahadūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.104:1.7: Uttāno gambhīrobhāso, gambhīro uttānobhāso, uttāno uttānobhāso, gambhīro gambhīrobhāso.
an4.104:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo uttāno hoti gambhīrobhāso?
an4.104:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.104:2.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.104:2.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo uttāno hoti gambhīrobhāso.
an4.104:2.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado uttāno gambhīrobhāso;
an4.104:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhīro hoti uttānobhāso?
an4.104:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.104:3.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.104:3.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhīro hoti uttānobhāso.
an4.104:3.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado gambhīro uttānobhāso;
an4.104:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo uttāno hoti uttānobhāso?
an4.104:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.104:4.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.104:4.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo uttāno hoti uttānobhāso.
an4.104:4.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado uttāno uttānobhāso;
an4.104:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhīro hoti gambhīrobhāso?
an4.104:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.104:5.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.104:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhīro hoti gambhīrobhāso.
an4.104:5.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado gambhīro gambhīrobhāso;
an4.104:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro udakarahadūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
